column4: I'm getting this same error when trying to run a .sh in ubuntu > http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=327108 however the suggested fix "dos2unix" doesn't seem to be a valid package with apt-get install dos2unix. Pleaes help?
it has been moved to the tofrodos package, the commands are now todos and fromdos
thanks, do you think I require to run those on my bash script?
yes, just: fromdos script_name.sh should do it
